content.rendered:
Directed by B. Unnikrishnan.

Written by B. Unnikrishnan.

Cast Mohanlal(Dr. Mathew Manjooran). Vishal(Dr. Shakthivel Palaniswami). Manju Warrier(Dr. Neelima Mathew). Meka Srikanth(Felix D. Vincent). Hansika Motwani(Shreya). Raashi Khanna(Harshitha Chopra). Renji Panicker(K. Sreenivasan). Chemban Vinod Jose(Iqbal Mohammed). Siddique(DGP) . Anand(Dinesh Tharakan). Idavela Babu(Police Constable). Joy Badlani(Veesmankur). Vishnu Govindhan(Pippu). Irshad(Kumar Valiyaveedan). Narayanan Nair(Khalid Mustafa). Kottayam Nazeer(Vinod Abraham). Antony Perumbavoor(Joy K. Thomas). Shafique Rahiman(Sinoj). Saikumar(Dr. Ram Kumar). Balaji Sarma(Mohan Nair). Angel Shijoy(Hansika (voice)). Sanju Sivram(Sravan). Aju Varghese(Churutt Kannappi)

Language Malayalam.

Producers Rockline Venkatesh.

Production Rockline Entertainment.
